评论概述: Doesn't breathe, but keeps you warm
评论详情: The MEROKEETY Women’s 2 Piece Fuzzy Fleece Pajama Set is hands down one of the best purchases I’ve made. From the moment I put it on, it felt like being wrapped in a warm, soft cloud. The fleece is so cozy, and it keeps me extra warm, which is perfect for cold nights.  I love the fit. The top is just the right amount of roomy, and the wide-leg pants are super comfortable without feeling sloppy. It’s great for relaxing at home and feels way more put-together than most loungewear.  What really impressed me is how well it holds up after washing. I’ve had fleece lose its softness in the past, but this set came out looking and feeling just as good as new. No pilling, no shedding, just as cozy as when I first got it.  If you’re someone who loves to feel warm and comfortable, this is perfect. I’ve been wearing it constantly, and it’s worth every penny. Highly recommend!
I want to live in this all the time! So cozy and warm and comfortable. I’m obsessed
Soft and fits well
I never use pajamas but felt I really wanted to be hugged and warm after a long day of work.  These are fantastic!

I absolutely love this leisure set. It is a must have on the weekends when your lounging at home. The suit runs big. I'm a medium (5'4)but it was way too long. The small was a much better fit for me.  I loved it so much I asked my daughter to purchase another set for me in wine!

评论概述: Cozy, cozy, and yes, more cozy!!
评论详情: The fabric is so comfortable, and for a tall girl the length on the pants is everything, even after being washed and yes dried, in the dryer lol! The only teeny tiny issue is that when worn outside, to run errands etc, it can feel warm, and for me that’s the last thing I want to feel while running errands! The material is soft and airy, if that makes sense, and the color is really pretty! Try it out, I’m sure it’ll look bomb!!

This comfy outfit is waaaay cuter in person! It's a great fit and sooooo soft. I didn't want anything very oversize so I went with my regular size (L) and it's perfect; loose but not oversize. I'm definitely going to get more colors.  This lounger is absolute perfection!!!
Love the quality of this and the size! It’s so comfortable and very stretchy!

Cozy and washes well! The elastic on the waistband would be nicer if it was sewn into the fabric with some ruching. Instead this kind of holds on like a hair elastic leaving an unattractive ring around the waist. I have to hike these way up and roll the band over a few times because I'm only 5' 2" and these run long. I still love lounging in this outfit.

I initially bought this for myself, but because the pant legs are so long I decided to give it to a friend for Christmas.  She loved it.  She’s taller than me and didn’t mind the oversized set.  The top also had really long arms.  So if you are 5’8” or taller the set should work perfectly.  Since I’m only 5’4” I was swimming in it.  I loved the softness of this set, I wish they made it in a petite size.
Fits a little bog but I wanted it that way. The elastic on the waistband is too tight, just enough to be uncomfortable, so I just cut it out. I love them and wear them all the time!

This product showed up in an obviously secondhand packaging bag, and when I opened it, I was so disgusted to see all kinds of hair and gross things on this pair. 60 bucks for something used and gross? Absolutely not!!!
So soft & looks just as pictured!! Worth the money!
I love this set! It is comfortable, and looks great on. It washes really well, also. I will be buying other colors.

Product is warm and very comfortable. The softness is the key love of this outfir.

I wanted to love this outfit… Super warm and cozy… But very poor stitching. The first time I wore it, the waist stitching unraveled, exposing the elastic waist band and I noticed a hole in the collar.

I got this as a Christmas present and while I adore it for the extreme soft and fuzziness, the sizing is inconsistent with itself. My gifter chose XL for me, Im currently in between L and XL as I attempt to lose weight....and while the pants seem to fit pretty well, at least in the waistband, the shirt is HUGE. It drapes well past both my shoulders and the sleeves are very long, which normally I would love, except they are also very wide - so rolling them up to wash dishes or do any cleaning doesn't really help since they don't stay rolled well.  I was gifted the teal green color which is perfect for my seasonal color palette (I'm a cool summer) and it can be very hard to find clothes that fall under this palette so I appreciate that. If I could return this and get a size down I would, but the return date is past and I was not the original buyer. Otherwise I love it, I've been wearing it for almost 3 days at night when temps in my area drop below 30° and it's hard to find warm clothes that aren't *too* thick.
Better than I expected. Washes well and so soft. Fit is great too. Ill probably order another color.

I like the look of this set it is very attractive, but the first thing I noticed was the smell.  The petroleum smell was so strong I had to wash is as soon as I took it out to the package.  It did wash well but the smell was still lingering. Hopefully with the next wash it will be gone.  The material  is soft but thin, I like it thin as I am always warm but if you aren't you may want to think about that.
Love the soft lounge set. Perfect for the house but I wouldn't wear this anywhere else.
I absolutely love this outfit. It is so cozy, very warm. I want it in every color! Washes well also and does not shrink

评论概述: Edited: Pretty color, but quality meh…
评论详情: Edited: Whereas the set didn’t work for me, see below, the customer support was outstanding.  I had high hopes for this lounge set because the color was absolutely beautiful, and the fabric was soft, cozy, and perfect for winter lounging. Unfortunately, the quality didn’t hold up. After just two wears, the waistband of the pants completely unraveled, which was disappointing for a set that seemed so promising.  It’s now sitting in my ‘fix or ditch’ pile, but honestly, it’s just not worth the thread to repair. While the fit and design were flattering, the durability left much to be desired. I wouldn’t recommend this set unless the manufacturer addresses the quality issues. There are better sets out there.

Love this. I am usually disappointed when I order mainly the pant part. Being I am 5’10’’ so I always have to buy tall pants. I seen these a looked super long so gave it a shot. They are beyond perfect in length. Super soft a just very happy. Just ordered the black set but now I’m off to order another color or 2
Love this lounge set. It’s great to wear around the house and so cozy. Not embarrassed to wear in front of company or even to the dinner table 😊

I purchased this in black, size Small. I'm 5'2, 121 lbs and overall it's a very good fit, not tight or too oversized. The pants are long but I can pull them up to my chest or fold the waistband over. I washed it on cold and dried on medium heat before wearing it. Happy to say it washed and dried without shrinking. The pants don't have pockets and the sleeves will not stay up if pulled up (in case this matters to you). It really is very comfortable and cozy!

I sized up which was perfect - if I had have gotten my usual size, the pants would definitely be too small. I wish it stayed as soft as it was in the beginning, but I still really like it and recommend it!
